title: The MTBPS represents a missed opportunity to resuscitate our ailing economy (COSATU - The Congress ...
text: ( Source : COSATU - The Congress of South African Trade Unions ) The MTBPS represents a missed opportunity to resuscitate our ailing economy 21 October 2015 COSATU has noted the Medium Term Budget Policy Statement {MTBPS} ,delivered by
